Reviews.Title: Picture Quality Perfect
Reviews.Author: Careful Reviewer
Reviews.Content: I considered all of the reviews by 'experts' on various product review sites and Consumer Reports. This camera was consistently rated highly. So were most of the Canon cameras, which are rated even higher.However, if you look carefully at the reviews (especially Consumer Reports), you will see that the overall rating is heavily influenced by things such as ease of operation, features, etc. Yet, they mostly say this Samsung had the single advantage of superior picture quality.I decided to forgo the other aspects of the reviews and get maximum picture quality. To me, the reason to use a camera is to get a good picture. I am not disappointed. I am not a camera buff and find this camera easy to use with more features than I'll ever use on a regular basis. Oh; and the picture quality is truly excellent - just what a camera should do.

Reviews.Title: Excellent all-purpose camera
Reviews.Author: M. Levy
Reviews.Content: This camera combined the advantages of excellent pictures, lots of features and low price in a pocket-size package.  The 28 mm equivalent zoom lens offers a wider than normal range for such small cameras.  Small videos were easy to take for web applicatons like You-Tube.Included software did a good job for picture editing, but video editing capability was minimal.  The only weakness I encountered was low sound level during video recording (required being very close to the person speaking).  On the other hand, my SLR doesn't offer any video recording.Picture quality has been similar to my SLR in most situations, but I will use the smaller camera more often since it is easier to carry.The bottom line:  I would definitely buy this camera again.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: W. A. Walsh "AW"
Reviews.Content: First consider that I'm upgrading from a 7+ year old Sony Cyber-shot that performed admirably over the years.  My wife and I finally agreed to buy a new camera and after a lot of research on [..] we chose this one.  We bought it along with an 8 GB memory card and are very pleased with it.  You have to read the instructions pretty thoroughly to make sure you understand all the settings, features, etc. but once you get it going it works great.  There is no view finder, just a screen, but we've not been hindered by this one bit.

Reviews.Title: Great Wall and No Pictures
Reviews.Author: Joseph E. Mcdonald
Reviews.Content: From the 8th January 2009. This Camera worked for two weeks Then the Thing stopped Working  I sent it at my Expense to Berry pro Camera. When It Returned it worked very nice until the 10th of May in Beijing it started to go bad. you turned it on and the lens came out juddered a bit then shut down with no pictures I tried charging the battery before I used it, that got me three pictures of The Great Wall of China  I would not Buy Again !!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Tyler Latz
Reviews.Content: This camera takes excellent pictures.  It is build for home and novice photographers, but offers enough options and a high enough resolution to be a great "on-the-go" camera for professional photographers as well.  I love the form factor and it has very good image stabilization.  I have actually used this to replace my 3 year old video camera as well, because of the great video quality.  For anyone looking at this camera, I have two words. Buy It!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for a Great Price!!!
Reviews.Author: Ericka Y. Aguilar "ReinaMaya"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It's compact and very easy to use.  The pictures are of great quality and won't miss any details.  For many weeks, I was shopping for a more than a good camera, comparing all different brands and prices and I'm glad I was able to find this Samsung for such a great price $137.43... This camera takes great quality pictures compared to the best brands (sony, kodak, etc.) Samsung products are really good and have become my favorite brand, specially because I don't need to spend a lot of money to get great quality products.  I have purchase several electronics of this brand and I'm very satisfied with this purchase too.  Another great Samsun item to add to my collection...

Reviews.Title: Awesome little camera!!!
Reviews.Author: Conni Mulligan
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera for three reasons: Great customer reviews, Quality Photos, and Cheap Price. It caught my eye earlier when it was the only subcompact camera Consumer Reports gave and Excellent rating for image quality. This camera takes GREAT pictures and the 13.6 megapixels allows you to zoom in on a photo 4 to 5 times before it shows any signs of pixelation. Stunning quality on large prints. The 'children' setting works well for moving shots but Duel Image Stablization setting has a long shutter time. It works well in low light but you do have to hold the camera very still. The flash is deceptively bright and room filling and the red-eye feature works well. Battery life seems good and recharging is easy via USB or AC Power.The negatives are poor video quality. I got the best results at 640 x 480 at 30 frames per second but it's not much better than  cell phone quality. If you zoom while videoing, the sound cuts out. I don't know why, just weird! Poor lighting and movement don't work to well with this camera(but using the 'children' setting with a flash helped conciderably).This is a Great Little Pocket Camera for photos.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Richard W. Roberts
Reviews.Content: Camera is wonderful!  Lots of features, very good when you zoom in. Fits in the hand nicely.

Reviews.Title: reconditioned
Reviews.Author: Peter Froiland
Reviews.Content: All the previous owner setting were on the camera. No maual, although I guess I can download one. Otherwise, quality item with good value.

Reviews.Title: Decent camera
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey D. Foss
Reviews.Content: This is a pretty good camera for the price. By now it has been replaced by other models. I see it as overall an indicator of good quality delivered by Samsung, compared to some other manufacturers. This is also based on my experience with Samsung cell phones, which I find pretty good. Picture quality is great, as long as there is plenty of light. In low light this camera suffers, though the flash works well. It is also pretty slow to take shots, more so in low light, so I get poor results trying to capture anything moving. In low light there can be a delay of 3 seconds between when you press the button and when the shutter clicks. It does not turn on and take pictures in your pocket like some I have owned. I have shot some primitive videos with it: resolution is poor. Sound is poor with the tiny microphone, and if in a very quiet environment, the recording will include the noise of the camera itself, probably the auto-focus running. It will serve for basic video memories, if you have nothing better. I find the build quality pretty good, it seems to stand up to some abuse. There are some bad reviews on here, of owners who have had it die early on. I consider that just a normal part of gadgets: even the best gadgets are going to have a percentage of failure. Fortunately for me, this camera has been solid for the two years I've had it.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy it
Reviews.Author: AF
Reviews.Content: Camera takes great pics.... when it works. Have had to use my iphone for pics for months now because this camera is almost always not working. Turn it on, lens pops out, beeps twice, then lens goes back in. Just did a search for help to fix and found a myriad of other troubled users with same issue. [...]Can't remember how long I've had this thing, really hoping still in warranty, but also am seeing horror stories of users sending theirs for repairs many many times and I'd rather just buy another camera if that is the case than go through awful customer service like that. What a shame, the pictures and features really were great when it did work.

Reviews.Title: Love this camera!!
Reviews.Author: etmama
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera.  It's easy to use and takes great pictures!  It takes the picture really fast (provided you turn off the flash) which is exactly what I needed to capture great photos of my active 4 year old.  I highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Compact, easy to use, nice extras
Reviews.Author: S. Bacon
Reviews.Content: This is a great camera with a great price. The photos turn out really nice, the 13.1MP are used well and not wasted, like some larger MP cameras. This camera is sleek and easy to use. The buttons are all similar to other digital cameras and recognizable for their functions. The screen is a decent size and very clear. This camera has a good range of 'extra features'. The zoom has a good digital and physical range, there is a wide angle lens, a video setting and a rechargeable battery. The camera comes with a USB charger, which can charge from the wall or your computer. The USB interface also allows for easy access to your files. There is an AV cable for showing your photos on TV, where they look pretty good. There is of course a slot for an SD card.Since getting this camera, I've been pretty impressed with all of it's features. I feel like I got a real good deal of a camera for the price I paid.

Reviews.Title: Poor performance, poor support
Reviews.Author: Online Buyer
Reviews.Content: Purchased this camera in February and it took spectacular pictures.  Easy to use too.  Worked well in March.  In April the temperatures hit 80 degrees and the camera refused to cooperate.  When powered on the lens would scroll out and then right back in.  Sent it in for repairs four times.  Each time they cleaned it, found nothing wrong with it and returned it.  It never worked any time that it was returned.  After the fourth trip for service and it still did not work I demanded my money back.  I was told that the warranty was for repair only and not refund, but that I could get an exchange.  I was asked to forward my receipt and I would be contacted within 48 hours.  I immediately emailed the receipt out and did not hear back from anyone. A week later I tried to call but the recording told me to leave my phone number and somebody would call me back.  I did and still no response.  I emailed twice and still no response.  I have no choice now but to file a VISA dispute, report it to the BBB, and any other recourse that I can think of.  Definitely NOT worth the trouble!!!

Reviews.Title: Piece of CRAP!!
Reviews.Author: Renee Monegain
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend purchased this camera for my birthday. I thought this was the best camera I had ever owned. It took beautiful pictures, and I fell in love with it, but it didn't work for long.  A month after using it, the camera would shut off continuously after the lens came out.  The battery was good, and charged. I would wait and then it would just start working at times. I took it on vacation in April when we went to California, and it stopped working.  I have not been able to get it to work since then. I am very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Samsung SL-310W 13MP
Reviews.Author: James White "Dr. Hunky"
Reviews.Content: It does everything that it is supposed to do. My only complaint is that there is no place on the camera where one can write identifying information such as phone # in case the camera is misplaced and an honest person finds it.

Reviews.Title: If this camera is any good, why is it being sold so cheap?
Reviews.Author: David Frank "bradleydad"
Reviews.Content: It appears that anyone who has had their camera over a few weeks has had problems with it. Perhaps that is why this camera was discontinued and you can buy them for $120 or less.

Reviews.Title: Maybe when I finally get it back I can REALLY review it
Reviews.Author: Bob Svoboda
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera expressly for my wife to go visit our newly born granddaughter to take lots of photos.  She got there and it would not work.  Would not take a single shot.  Samsung customer service couldn't help so we had to send it back (at our cost).  I'm expecting the repaired camera to arrive within a few days now.  I would not make this purchase again.Oh, something else.  Amazon's vendor of this camera, forget the name, called and asked if they could just replace it.  But since it was a closeout camera they wanted to replace it with another brand (Kodak) which cost $15 more.  Amazon was offering that same camera for $5 less than my original Samsung but Amazon had a different vendor for the Kodak camera.  My original vendor would not match the price.  A pox on all their houses.

Reviews.Title: Horrible camera
Reviews.Author: Ann M. Puccio
Reviews.Content: I am so disappointed in this camera. It takes blurry pics, even if you hold down the button 1/2 way like it says so the lens can focus.  Horrible quality.  I have just put it in a drawer and I don't use.  It is very frustrating.  I have tried various settings.  I even passed it along to a friend for him to use to make sure it wasn't me...Same problems.  The pics were horrible.  And forget it if you want to take distant pics.  You pretty much have to be on top of your subject to even have a chance.

ProductInfo.Features:
13.6-megapixel sensor captures enough detail for photo-quality poster-sized prints
3.6x wide-angle optical zoom lens; Dual Image Stabilization
Face Detection AF and AE; Smile and Blink Detection
2.7-inch Intelligent LCD; MPEG4 movie recording
Capture images and video to SD/SDHC memory cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung SL-310W 13.6MP Digital Camera with 3.6x Wide Angle Optical Image Stabilized Zoom (Silver)
